name: 1-digit addition - no carry
misconceptions: make an off-by-one error

name: 1-digit subtraction - no borrow
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
adding instead of subtracting

name: Multiplication tables - up to 5
misconceptions: confuse one table with another

name: 2+1 digit addition - no carry
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error, 
add the second number at the wrong place value

name: 2+2 digit addition - no carry
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error, 
add the second number at the wrong place value

name: 2-1 digit subtraction - no borrow
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
adding instead of subtracting,
subtract the second number at the wrong place value

name: 1-digit addition - carry
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
forget to add the carry

name: 2-digit addition - carry
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
forget to add the carry,
add the second number at the wrong place value

name: 2+2 digit addition - double carry
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
forget to add one of the carries,
add the second number at the wrong place value

name: 2-1 digit subtraction - borrow
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
adding instead of subtracting
forget to add one of the carries,
subtract the second number at the wrong place value

name: 2-2 digit subtraction - no borrow
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
adding instead of subtracting,
subtract the second number at the wrong place value

name: Multiplication tables - 5 to 10
misconceptions: confuse one table with another

name: 3-digit addition - no carry
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error, 
add the second number at the wrong place value

name: 3-digit addition - single carry
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
forget to add the carry,
add the second number at the wrong place value

name: 3-digit subtraction - no borrow
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
adding instead of subtracting,
subtract the second number at the wrong place value

name: 2-1 digit subtraction - borrow
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
adding instead of subtracting
forget to add one of the carries,
subtract the second number at the wrong place value

name: 2-2 digit subtraction - borrow
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
adding instead of subtracting
forget to add one of the carries,
subtract the second number at the wrong place value

name: 3-digit addition - double carry
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
forget to add one of the carries,
add the second number at the wrong place value

name: 3-digit subtraction - single borrow
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
adding instead of subtracting
forget to add one of the carries,
subtract the second number at the wrong place value

name: 3-digit subtraction - double borrow
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
adding instead of subtracting
forget to add one of the carries,
subtract the second number at the wrong place value

name: 2x1 multiplication - no carry
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
add instead of multiply

name: 3x1 multiplication - no carry
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
add instead of multiply

name: 2x1 multiplication - carry
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
add instead of multiply,
forget to add one of the carries

name: 3x1 multiplication - single carry
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
add instead of multiply,
forget to add one of the carries

name: 3x1 multiplication - double carry
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
add instead of multiply,
forget to add one of the carries,
multiply the second number at the wrong place value

name:
2x2 multiplication - no carry
(multiplication part should not have carry)
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
add instead of multiply,
forget to multiply the other place values,
forget to add carries during addition

name: 2/1 division without remainder
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
make mistakes while adding or subtracting during division

name: 3/1 division without remainder
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
make mistakes while adding or subtracting during division

name: 2x2 multiplication - carry
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
add instead of multiply,
forget to add one of the carries,
multiply the second number at the wrong place value

name: 2/1 division with remainder
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
make mistakes while adding or subtracting during division

name: 3/1 division with remainder
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
make mistakes while adding or subtracting during division

name: 3x2 multiplication - carry
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
add instead of multiply,
forget to add one of the carries,
multiply the second number at the wrong place value

name: 3/1 division with 0 in quotient
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
make mistakes while adding or subtracting during division,
forget to account for the 0 in the quotient

name: 4/1 division with remainder
misconceptions:
make an off-by-one error,
make mistakes while adding or subtracting during division
